Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I really loved this place. Great bagels at a fair price. I tried the warm tuna bagel which was delicious, and the big latte which was huge and very tasty. I was working there with my laptop and the team was so nice. highly recommend it!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: We must've went here like 4 times in 6 days. The coffee was one of the best I had in the Netherlands and the bagels were very solid as well.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great service, great bagels, and great coffee! Perfect for those looking for vegan options and a nice atmosphere with fresh and tasty food. Good value for money especially for my large coffee that was as big as my head!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Excellent choice for a quick bite to eat that is delicious and satisfying. The food comes out fast but it doesn't taste anything like fast food. Great prices and service!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Delicious food and drinks.  best gluten free bagel, maybe the only actual GF bagel I‚Äôve had. Vegan cream cheeses that are delicious. Fresh veggies. Highly recommend but be advised they are sort on staff Oct2021 and service is slow.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Brilliant service, tasty bagels. The staff are probably the highlight of this place, all really  freindly and helpful. The bagels are equally brilliant. I've been several times and the BLT is brilliant. The wild salmon and cream cheese is ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Good place to get a good start for your day!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Very cozy place with a lot of healthy food. Yes, bagels don't always mean "fast-food"! You can order gluten free options, perfect salads, fantastic coffee wuth oat or almond milk. Dog&kids-friendly

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
Food is consistent no matter which branch you go to.
In this particular branch on this day they were short staffed and it showed. The waiter came across as very false Happy, and you sensed he has ready to explode.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Very nice bagels, although my friends salad wasn't washed and had a little bit of dirt in there. However it was still very pleasant and tasty

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I ordered a Gluten-free bagel, because i am Allergic to Gluten‚Ä¶ after eating the bagel i had to threw up cause something wasn‚Äòt gf

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
Great and cosy place, friendly owner with a passion for the craft of making the best bagels.
Go here if you're in the neighborhood and in for a proper cup of coffee and a biteüëåüëç

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I had a BLT Bagel on my first trip to Amsterdam earlier this month. It was just wonderful! Thank you for the wonderful service, food, and atmosphere!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Went their on a Thursday morning and it was really calm. Used this place as a homeworking Office and it was really nice. Staff was really caring and talkative :-) I went for the salamon bagel with cream cheese (around 9‚Ç¨?) and the verry ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Chain of bagel and coffee restaurants. The menu items seem perfect for both breakfast and lunch. The iced coffee is AMAZING. The bagel sandwiches were great too. The prana bagel which was interesting but I recommend reading what it is before trying it. The prices of the menu items seem reasonable.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Best bagels in town! A lot of vegetarian options, great coffee and healthy juices ! Great herbal tea options as well :) do not miss it if you are visiting and also have to work remotely, the perfect place to work and to eat some good healthy food that is also quit affordable ! One of my favorite gems in the Netherlands in general!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Had a toasted Ham, cheese and tomato bagel. It was delicious. Also the staff is really friendly and helpful.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: This place was good, it only had a very select few options for vegans however. But the bagel that I had was pretty tasty. Coffee was also tasty and the price was good too. Decor and service could be improved on. Not keen on the mismatching crockery.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Beautiful rustic interior, nice staff and AMAZING bagels! Their gluten-free bagel is very tasty. I highly recommend eating your lunch here! I‚Äôm definitely coming back!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
Very bad place. You wait for one bagel approximately 30 min.
They don't clean the tables when a costumer leaves the store. You have to tell them : ey jo, clean this up or for what are you waiting for.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Amazing Bagels. The bagel with salmon is the best. Fresh salmon. I just ate here and it was perfect. The staff is great and friendly

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Sesame seed sourdough bagel with honey and walnut cream cheese and avocado salad and it was delightful! Good coffee too.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: The staff is very friendly and attentive and they have a great selection of bagels.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Stopped here for breakfast after visiting the Anne Frank House, around the corner. Had a breakfast combo which was made up of a bagel (you can choose from several varieties but I suggest getting the sourdough!), rich cream cheese ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Tasty bagels with nice combos and a good coffee, the best start for a day :)

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Cute cafe with delicious bagels. The staff was very kind and helpful and recommended toppings for a glutenfree bagel. Great taste, friendly staff! üíï

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Super clean and friendly. Music was good and the food was excellent. Next time I'd pass on the espresso though.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
‚ÄúUnorganized & chaotic‚Äù
I only walked in here because I thought it would be good to try it as it being a local restaurant option rather than the giant chains. Well I wish I didn't, ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Nice place which holds some great bagels for vegans also. Enjoyed it a lot.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: The best coffee in my life. Ask for receipt and stuff friendly helped me. Will try to make the same in my country, but strongly recommend to drink first here.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great place to start your day with bagels and special collections of tea

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Nice place for a light bite.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great food, service was decent. The bagels we're quiet filling, I got the avacado

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Top notch bagels at a good price, the truffle mushroom burger was incredible. Nice atmosphere and decor inside

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Excellent bagels, good prices. You can also try bagel with bugs

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: delicious! the prices are very high but it‚Äôs has a unique cosy vibe and very friendly and helpful staff! they‚Äôre happy to speak english and help foreigners.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Brilliant bagels with very good service and good prices.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Very tasty food, smily service, nice atmosphere, lots of fair trade products or organic.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Really nice place with good service.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Seeing the ratings I was honestly expecting more than just an average breakfast Store. Wasn't really worth the walk there. The bagels were dry and the store is not that special neither. Don't get ne wrong I would advice against it.. Just saying that you should probably not expect to be thrilled by it.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
Maybe this chain overall is not bad, but my experience at that place was awful.
I came for a breakfast, my table was dirty with a sticky spot and black hair on it. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Amazing service, lovely fresh mint tea (generous with mint too!). Me and my partner had the tuna bagel and the mozzarella bagel and they were exquisite. This place is a big part of why I come to Amsterdam.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Very pleasent Place. The Stuff was very nice happy. Overall it has a very warm feeling and i would recommend it if you are near

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Absolutely amazing place! Had a quick lunch here on a rainy day, found a random bagel place. Turns out they have GF bagels, which made me extremely happy! They were delicious and staff was so funny and friendly!! Will definitely visit again! üòçüòç

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Classic bagels and beans, although this is one of the few branches still putting those addictive chocolate beans in front of you:)

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Very good ! Thanks so much for the lunch. I recommande !

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Love the Bagel & Beans chain. Last visited this branch March 2019. The guy who served us was friendly, polite & attentive and our food did't take long to arrive. Always good quality. However, the Almond Latte is a very acquired taste! :-)

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Delicious bagels with toppings, not so delicious coffee.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: ‚ÄûOh you are seven people I cannot tell everyone which bread we have. I have ONE more table.‚Äú

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: love spending my time here either studying for uni or just hanging out with friends. The bagels are awesome, the staff is always friendly even though it can take a while for them to take your order (or notice you are there) when you are sitting downstairs, which is where I almost always prefer to sit.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I loved this place so much that we went twice when we were in the area!  The coffee was the best I had on this trip and the many different bagels, oh my goodness, YUMMMMMMM!  The staff was very friendly and it was very clean :)

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: My favorite and trusty cafe! Yummy food and drinks, good service, vegan options available, healthy foods and good quality goods. Always a joy going to Bagels and Beans. You can also save points via their app which is great.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: A beautiful little spot where you can get some decent, healthy food if you want it! There is a reasonably priced wide selection; you can choose your type of bagel and your type of cream cheese when ordering one of the excellent, varied and ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Nice little cafe to visit and have a few coffees with friends

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: My first ever bagel! A small place, but it‚Äôs got a homely feeling. Staff are very friendly and it‚Äôs not too expensive for the area either. You might want to bring cash as for some reason it rejected all 4 of mine and partners UK debit cards.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Fresh, beautiful food. Staff are lovely and helpful. You MUST visit!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Good bagels, lots of options including vegan and gluten free. Price is ok, not that cheap but considering location the price is fair. They have nice fruit juices also. Really enjoyed our brunch here and would recommend, the menu is also ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: This one is my favourite Bagels & Beans in Amsterdam. Sneak downstairs to find a seat even when it's all packed on the ground level, and then watch the feet of shoppers above. It might be smart, in fact, to place your order before going ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Needs a clean up, but it gives it a certain charm. Both of us had a lovely bagel. I had brie walnut and honey. If your not local make sure you understand the coffee you order. We ordered large but got double espresso -  was very nice ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great bagels, great flavors! Truly not expensive for what you get.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Delicious fruit popsicles. Especially liked the watermelon mint flavor. Great coffee too. Highly recommended!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Tasty bagels with a great selection of bagel breads. A pretty interior with friendly staff. I ordered the meatless magic and I think they need to heat the part up or perhaps they forgot because it was cold and detracted from the overall ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
We had lunch at this place. The tables outside were served very slowly and by a grumpy waiter. The food was mediocre (dry bagel, not so tasty filling).
But then came the worst part of our experience. I have paid separately and my ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Food was okay but coffe didn‚Äôt meet expectations (have been to B&B before). The worst thing was that the owner was behind the counter and enjoying a cheese bagel himself while prepping our drinks. We could see from our table that he was ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Yeah, was nice, (went in 2015) was not too crowded, short wait for food arrival, but also neatly constructed bagels (i.e. not sloppily slapped together). ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
Bagels are delicious and the coffee is great aswell!
A perfectly tasty and healthy breakfast!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Very poor and slow service and condescending owner. Half of us were not able to eat !!  We were a party of seven people today. We were seated outside. We waited 30min to get our tables cleaned (they were very dirty and we asked for it ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Tasty Bagels and coffee! Would go there again.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Cute place with several locations in the city of Amsterdam. Good variety of coffee and tea drinks and tasty bagel options (also vegan and gluten free options). Prices are fair and service is fast and nice. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: It is not a place you can sit and chat for 1.5 hours by drinking only coffee, they will come and ask at least 3 times what you would like to drink in 10 minute intervals after an hour. There are better places around that you will feel more comfortable.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: We got sent away because we couldn't sit 5 people at the same table.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Don't expect to be treated friendly or nicely when you don't speak Dutch. We sat down for a good 30 minutes and even asked the staff three times to take our order. Instead they helped two groups that came after us instead. Very disappointed ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Beautiful food as expected with the quality received it was busy but had a great atmosphere. Every single staff member was friendly and willing to help as much as possible. Gluten free.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: A great place for coffee and breakfast!! Would definitely recommend! The staff were really friendly and served us quickly. While it does get quite busy, there seems to be always somewhere to sit. We returned the next day after our first time here, loved it.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Nice place to grab a bite to eat and a drink. Had a really nice pink ginger drink and a vegan bagel. Lots of options if you have any dietary requirements such as gluten free or dairy free.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Fantastic cappuccino and bagel choices. Everything bagel ordered "toasted strong mature cheese" came with ham and tomatoes. Location close to center city. About 16 Euro for 2 cappuccinos and 2 specialty bagels. Charge station at front bar seating. Restroom downstairs not safe for elderly or handicapped people.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I'm a big fan of B&B in general. However, this location is a disaster because of the very rude owner. We wanted to get some breakfast, walked in and chose a table next to the window since we wanted to enjoy watching the street life. For ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: My friend had the vegan bagel burger, which was quite nice. But my cream cheese bagel with black olive tapenade and dried tomatoes was the bomb. Also the vegan pecan pie! Definitely would go there again, and there are lots of vegan/vegetarian options on the menu.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Excellent bagels and fresh juices and coffee!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: This place is always very busy. Sometimes it's hard to get a table. Good thing there are more Bagel & Beans shops in town. But the food is good! Bonus: they serve a gluten-free bagel.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Tasty. Quick. Loved getting it to go and enjoying sitting outside to enjoy my meal

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Even though they knew we're clearly locals, we were asked to pay in advance of receiving food which didn't leave the best impression. Because it's not the norm in Amsterdam it gives impression that they think you've done something wrong ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I love this place! Really friendly And cozy. I can definitely recommend this place!!!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Long service but good food.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Amazing bagels! I would love to have something like this in my country too. They even have gluten-free options if you have celiac disease.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Pretty decent bagels, excellent matcha latte

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Disgusting place, disgusting bagels. We waited 45 minutes to get our food. The people next to us waited a while to order food, but no one ever came, so they left. The tables, floor, everything was so dirty! Really disappointing. I went to B&B in Herleen, it was fantastic! Raadhuistraat really ruins the image of the chain!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
Pro coffee tip!
To all the waiters who had been employed here between 11 to 13 months:
Learn the difference between Machiatto and Latte! ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I really like the different kinds of bagels they offer here. My favourite bagel is the one with goat cheese and honey. Also the selection of different teas is very good.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Popped in here by chance, nice food and atmosphere and friendly staff.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Delicious and simple - loved the big coffees on our trip last year! Thanks for the vegan options. :) That's what brought us here.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I go to Bagels&Beans a lot, really like the one in Almere, but this particular branch keeps disappointing me! A few months back me and my boyfriend went here but decided to leave after waiting for over 30 minutes without any waiters ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Delicious bagels, huge coffees and friendly staff. Nestled in the middle of Amsterdam so super convenient for a bite to eat in between stops.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great place, do go! You won't regret it, pretty cheap and very tasty.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I was sitting in the venue for 30min and none of the waiters came. It wasn't even crowded.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I love Bagels&Beans food!! The staff at Raddhuisstraat is amazingly friendly and caring. Thanks for keeping eye in your costumers the hottest days of the year in Amsterdam üòÅ

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Currently waiting in this restaurant and although the food might be great we wouldn't know as we have been waiting 45 minutes for our food and haven't even received our drinks yet. We also had to go to find a waitress as nobody came to serve us... Disappointed and will be going elsewhere next time

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Very good menu if you are more health conscious than I am, lots of 'super food' seeds and salads on offer with a great choice of bagels, I had the BLT on sesame and was delicious. Worth a try if you are passing on a canal walk.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: This is a franchise operation and bagels & beans are found in several cities in the Netherlands, and several outlets in Amsterdam. This particular outlet could improve customer service, but the basic (common menu) makes a good lunch at an affordable price.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Yes they have gluten free bagels, and very good too. The only downside for me was that they charge for tap water, and I didn't want to buy a drink.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Been eating breakfast here for my entire stay in Amsterdam! Great coffee with an option for soy instead of milk, and their veggie bagels are amazing (I recommend veggie chicken with teriyaki sauce and a cinnamon raisin bagel)

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: The salmon and cream cheese bagels with capers and onions are the best I've ever eaten. Coffee is amazing too

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Inexperienced but friendly staff, okay coffee and the bagels were a bit stale. They left a table full of dishes dirty for almost one hour.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: This is one of the places I love in Holland. It's not the regular cafe but  a wonderful original place for a selection of bagels dishes, matcha latte, oat drinks etc etc. Fully recommended for being special!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Today we received our bagles and drinks with filthy knives, forks and cups. Because it took long to replace them we started eating using the spoons from the tea and the kids drank from the bottles. Halfway the waitress came with 'clean' ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: One of my favourite breakfast place. Varieties of bagels, creams, sauces. I can recommend!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
Good vegetarian menu, all is freshly made. We took the mushroom burger and the Salmon bagel.
The deserts weren't very fresh, maybe because it was on a Sunday.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Very slow and rude service. Waited and had to go to the counter otherwise we would have never gotten our food. At least the bagel tasted good.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Nice lunch room, very friendly and relaxed staff. Not very friendly for wheelchairs or canes. Toilet is downstairs

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Delicious food! The salmon bagel was incredible, everything was so fresh and tasty!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great staff, super friendly staff and the coffee was really tasty. Loved the mugs and saucers too, so cute! Would recommend

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Has to be the tastiest bagels I have ever had! Almost as good as NY! And the staff were amazing and friendly, a defiantly must go for breakfast or lunch!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I had both bagels and beans here. There were bugs on my food, but I requested them so that was okay. Quite pleasant, actually.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Delicious bagels and super friendly staff!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Always good. Sun dried tomato cream cheese bagel is the best by far!!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Super fresh and nice, big variety to choose from, healthy breakfast in the city almost on every corner! Strawberry cro-muffin is heaven!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: They have glutem free bagels and vegetarian options. Super tasty wild salmon. It's a little small but the staff is nice and helpful

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: As always really good. Loved the glutenfree options.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: My bagel was good but minimal. Decoration and atmosphere were lacking. I came here for the wifi. Don't think I'll be back next time I'm in Amsterdam.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: The glutenfree bagels are great! It doesn‚Äôt really have the magic athmosphere i‚Äôve seen elsewhere, but in overfall a pretty good place.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Bagels and gluten free bagels are excellent, I had a brunch of vegetarian options (with mushrooms) and it was delicious. Very relaxed atmosphere I'll surely come back here!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Excellent and friendly staff. Food is solid (not NYC leave bagels but good for Traveller level). Coffee hit the spot.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: The food is good, big portions. Gets too busy and the service is very slow. The bacon in my bagel was cold, needed to return it

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great serves, nice atmosphere and amazing bagels, a bit pricey at times but definitely worth it.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: It tests really good. the place is a little bit small, but I really enjoyed my meal there.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Nice food

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
A bit expensive but delicious. My recommendation is bagels with cheese cream.

Restaurant's staffs are polite and their service is great.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Love this rock lee drawingüòç

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
Absolutely gorgeous food, so much viarity
The staff were all really nice and the place was decorated well,

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Good as any other of the franchise. Has a nice area outside.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Dirty, not really bagels just bread. But mostly so dirty inside. Menu said our order comes with guacamole, not even g from guac

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Has vegan options, I tried 1 of them, the bagel was crispy and fresh. It was very very good.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: love the place, we three had lunch here, the food is nice, frinks are freshly made, the shop is very cosy and clean, you got internet as well.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: The waiter took my drink before I'd finished it & accidently knocked it over onto me in the process. He wasn't particularly apologetic either.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: We loved it. Fresh and great ingredients with a nice presentation and friendly staff! Wonderful ambiance and super yummy.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Bagels are sooooo tasty !!! My favorite Tomato flavor, never thought I would like it, but it was surprisingly good

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Amazing place to get lunch in Amsterdam! Nice staff, very affordable and delicious tasty bagels ü§§

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Delicious! Bagels are just gorgeous üòãüòãüòã Especially Breakfast Bagel-Power!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Food was great, service was average, the girl seemed quite moody/annoyed. Table was dirty and I ended up cleaning it myself.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Slow service (30 minutes for drinks, 1 hour for meals), tables very dirty unpleasant boss and forgetting orders: we even for bawled when we ask for orders.... Inacceptable ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: As usual great cofdee, great cheesecake, great bagels. I am just sorry to see that they don't serve that lunch for two anymore.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: 50 pounds for party of 5. Food was delicious but no actual table service.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great food but slightly messy service. A little more organisation would be great!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Good place to have lunch. Offer good gluten-free options and know what they are doing when preparing the food.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I loved the possibility of choosing the bagel type and the type of cheese cream! The staff is super friendly:)

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Nice place, extremely clean, staff very friendly

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great service and food! The salmon and cream cheese bagel was awesome.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Extemely rude lady behind the counter. We left, and would never go back or recommend it to anyone. I have never come across a more rude lady who doesn‚Äôt know who to speak to customers. Terrible experience

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
Amazing Bagels with a good choice of Tea & Coffee at a reasonable price.
Service is a little slow but well worth the wait.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Awesome place. Prices were very decent for Amsterdam, especially for how big their large cappuccino is!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great food, really friendly staff, cool location and one of the best coffee

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great little breakfast spot that also has free WiFi. Can be busy but would compare it to any other local cafe, just happens to be a chain.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Service a tad slow but the staff were friendly and there were delicious bagels!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: A cozy, quaint place for breakfast. Great food and stellar service. Everyone was so nice!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Sensational food. For those who crave the healthier alternatives this is one of the must try venues. They also cater to vegetarian and vegan culinaries.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Ate the everything bagle with vegan cream cheese. Was very nice but a little expensive for a portuguese pocket.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: This place is the best. We stumbled across it but loved it! Great food!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Lovely staff, delicious bagels and great coffe- that's what I needed in the morning!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Their salmon bagel is just perfect, I heard their coffee is really good, their chai latte was awesome

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Good place for a bagel and a coffee, consistent quality at each I've visited.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
Amazing service and amazing food!!!

Would definitely recommend.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Very tasty and freshly made bagels. Efficient staff. Very good service

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Good example of this franchise. Staff very friendly. Nice atmosphere. Good coffee.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Slow at peak hours but friendly stuff covers that already. Nice vegan choices for those who are into that.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Good selection of gluten free and vegan bagels, great coffee too!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Very good breakfast

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great bagels, good service. Happy and friendly place.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Nice, simple bagels made well with good ingredients. Chilled vibe on a Sunday morning.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Gluten-free bagels are amazing! Great place, relaxed atmosphere.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Extremely busy and not enough staff to take care of it. Better choose  bagels&beans at a different location.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Delicious food, really kind staff and great loose teas!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Have the tapas for 2. Loads of different dips and 2 bagels.  Best coffee too.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I had a decent chai latte, the pricing is reasonable too.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
Absolutly great and delicious!
